verses.t: Therefore{G5124} seeing{G1223} we have{G2192} this{G3778} ministry{G3588}, as{G2531} we have received mercy{G1653}, we faint{G1573} not{G3756};

But{G235} have renounced{G550} the hidden things{G2927} of dishonesty{G3588}, not{G3361} walking{G4043} in{G1722} craftiness{G3834}, nor{G3366} handling{G1389} the word{G3588} of God{G3588} deceitfully{G1389}; but{G235} by manifestation{G3588} of the truth{G3588} commending{G4921} ourselves{G1438} to{G4314} every{G3956} man's{G444} conscience{G4893} in the sight of{G1799} God{G3588}.
But{G1161} if{G1487} our{G2257} gospel{G3588} be hid{G2572}, it is{G2076} hid{G2572} to{G1722} them{G3588} that are{G2076} lost{G622}:

In{G1722} whom{G3739} the god{G3588} of this{G5127} world{G3588} hath blinded{G5186} the minds{G3588} of them which believe not{G571}, lest{G3361} the light{G3588} of the glorious{G3588} gospel{G3588} of Christ{G3588}, who{G3739} is{G2076} the image{G1504} of God{G3588}, should shine{G826} unto them{G846}.UNSURE: Tagging of Preposition "en" with "noema"
For{G1063} we preach{G2784} not{G3756} ourselves{G1438}, but{G235} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424} the Lord{G2962}; and{G1161} ourselves{G1438} your{G5216} servants{G1401} for{G1223} Jesus' sake{G2424}.

For{G3754} God{G3588}, who{G3739} commanded{G2036} the light{G5457} to shine{G2989} out of{G1537} darkness{G4655}, hath shined{G2989} in{G1722} our{G2257} hearts{G3588}, to{G4314} give the light{G5462} of the knowledge{G3588} of the glory{G3588} of God{G3588} in{G1722} the face{G4383} of Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}.

But{G1161} we have{G2192} this{G5126} treasure{G3588} in{G1722} earthen{G3749} vessels{G4632}, that{G2443} the excellency{G3588} of the power{G3588} may be{G5600} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} not{G3361} of{G1537} us{G2257}.
We are troubled{G2346} on{G1722} every side{G3956}, yet{G235} not{G3756} distressed{G4729}; we are perplexed{G639}, but{G235} not{G3756} in despair{G1820};
Persecuted{G1377}, but{G235} not{G3756} forsaken{G1459}cast down{G2598}, but{G235} not{G3756} destroyed{G622};

Always{G3842} bearing about{G4064} in{G1722} the body{G3588} the dying{G3588} of the Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424}, that{G2443} the life{G3588} also{G2532} of Jesus{G3588} might be made manifest{G5319} in{G1722} our{G2257} body{G3588}.

For{G1063} we{G2249} which live{G2198} are alway{G104} delivered{G3860} unto{G1519} death{G2288} for{G1223} Jesus' sake{G2424}, that{G2443} the life{G3588} also{G2532} of Jesus{G3588} might be made manifest{G5319} in{G1722} our{G2257} mortal{G2349} flesh{G4561}.
So then{G5620} death{G2288} worketh{G1754} in{G1722} us{G2254}, but{G1161} life{G2222} in{G1722} you{G5213}.

We{G2249} having{G2192} the same{G846} spirit{G4151} of faith{G3588}, according as{G2596} it is written{G1125}, I believed{G4100}, and therefore{G1352} have I spoken{G2980}; we{G4100} also{G2532} believe{G4100}, and{G2532} therefore{G1352} speak{G2980};

Knowing{G1492} that{G3754} he which{G3588} raised up{G1453} the Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} shall raise up{G1453} us{G2248} also{G2532} by{G1223} Jesus{G2424}, and{G2532} shall present{G3936} us with{G4862} you{G5213}.

For{G1063} all things{G3956} are for{G1223} your sakes{G5209}, that{G2443} the abundant{G4121} grace{G3588} might{G4052} through{G1223} the thanksgiving{G3588} of many{G4119} redound{G4052} to{G1519} the glory{G3588} of God{G3588}.

For which cause{G1352} we faint{G1573} not{G3756}; but{G235} though{G1487} our{G2257} outward{G1854} man{G444} perish{G1311}, yet{G235} the inward{G2081} man is renewed{G341} day{G2250} by{G2532} day{G2250}.
For{G1063} our{G2257} light{G1645} affliction{G3588}, which is but for a moment{G3910}, worketh{G2716} for us{G2254} a far{G5236} more exceeding{G5236} and eternal{G166} weight{G922} of glory{G1391};

While we{G2257} look{G4648} not{G3361} at the things{G3588} which are seen{G991}, but{G235} at the things{G3588} which are{G991} not{G3361} seen{G991}: for{G1063} the things{G3588} which are seen{G991} are temporal{G4340}; but{G1161} the things{G3588} which are{G991} not{G3361} seen{G991} are eternal{G166}.
